location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nawab Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire, to Thomas Dobinson, Commander of the HC Brig Ternate

mods.abstract: Nawab Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident, Bushire, informs Thomas Dobinson, Commander of the HC Brig Ternate,of a packet that has arrived at Bushire from Europe and requests that Dobinson hold the vessel under his command in readiness to proceed to Bombay in the course of twenty-four hours or sooner.
